trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Eureka
There were no other sightings in Eureka on or around January 29th 2001
divs: sighting details12:55pt,eureka,ca. while walking my son home from school26 the grocery store, he pointed out a contrail and jet. it was unusual in thatthere was a shaft of darknessthat the jet was on a parallel course with (bearingapprox.300 deg. over the ocean). he asked me why there was a dark line that thejet was following. as a nws\faa certified weather observer, i should have had ananswer, but i didnt. i say professionally that it was not smoke, but a shaft ofdiminished light, and the jet was following it exactly. then, about 1000 yardsin front of the jet, at the terminus of the shaft, there was a very bright burstof white light, with a spherical object within. altitude was approx.16-18kft.the object then disappeared, and the shaft disippated after about 1 min. i haveworked aviation weather since 1993, and served on an aircraft carrier beforethat. i have never seen anything like this before. i know aircraft and airweapons. this was not a conventional aircraft.
Summary: A horizontal shaft of darkness and a bright flash
